window-movieopen-wait: Please wait while the movie list is loaded...
window-movieopen-error: The movie list could no be open. Please try again.

window-movieprop-loading: Loading anmation (will display while loading scene data)
window-movieprop-savedisplayabout: *Setting these values will cause the movie to reload. Also, notice that additional adjust may be required on the movie scenes.

window-movieprop-stringssendno: The selected file is not a valid JSON.
window-movieprop-themeabout: Adjust the movie UI theme below. Use HEX values for colors like #FFFFFF or 0xFF9900. Leave empty to use the default values (dark theme).
window-movieprop-theme-controlDisabledFi: Control Disabled Fill Color (disabled buttons color)
window-movieprop-theme-scrollBarThumbDis: Scroll Bar Thumb Disabled Fill Color
window-movieprop-theme-disabledInsetBord: Disabled Inset Border Color (text areas or slider borders)
window-movieprop-theme-selectedInsetBord: Selected Inset Border Color (text areas or slider borders)
window-movieprop-theme-activeFillBorderC: Active Fill Border Color (border color for active controls)
window-movieprop-theme-selectedBorderCol: Selected Border Color (control border color when selected)
window-movieprop-theme-insetBorderColor: Inset Border Color (text areas or slider borders)
window-movieprop-theme-containerFillColo: Container Fill Color (background color for containers)
window-movieprop-theme-dangerFillColor: Danger Fill Color (to indicate danger operations)
window-movieprop-theme-dividerColor: Divider Color (color for sections separate areas)
window-movieprop-plavailable: Available plugins: check the ones to activate for current movie
window-movieprop-inputabout: You can set movie reactions to several input methods like keyboard press. Choose a predefined behavior or use action snippet names to set.
window-movieprop-accessgroup: Allowed visitor groups (ctrl+click to unselect/select several, none for free access)
window-movieprop-accessfallback: Movie to open on access denied
window-movieusers-colabout: You may invite creators to help developing the movie. Add their e-mail addresses to the list below.
window-movieusers-errorlist: Error while getting the collaborators list. Please try again.
window-movieusers-ownerabout: You are the current movie owner. You may transfer it to another registered user, but remember that you'll loose the ability to edit all movie properties after that. Your will be automatically add to this movie collaborators list.
window-movieusers-ownernew2: Type the new owner e-mail address again
window-movieusers-ownermatch: The new owner e-mail address and the confirmation do no match.
window-movieusers-ownerok: The movie was correctly transfered to another user.
window-movieusers-ownernomail: The provided e-mail address does not belong to an active user.
window-movieusers-ownererror: Error while transfering the movie. Please try again.
window-movieusers-unlockabout: When an user opens a scene, it is locked to prevent other userd to edit it at the same time. The scene remains locked for 15 minutes - this period is renewed each time the scene is saved. As the movie owner you can force the unlock of all scenes at any time.
window-movieremove-about: Check out the list of your movies below. You can remove any of them. Attention: you won't be able to revert this action - please export the movie before removing it so you can import it again if necessary.
window-movieremove-confirm: If you remove the selected movie you won't be able to recover it. Please be sure to export it before so you can import it again if needed. Are you sure you want to remove this movie?
window-movieplugin-enable: Enable this plugin on current movie
window-movieplugin-nomvsetup: This plugin doesn't require movie properties setting.
window-movieplugin-noscsetup: This plugin doesn't require scene properties setting.

menu-exchange-publish:
Save for publish services
(itch.io, Game Jolt, etc)
menu-exchange-desktop:
Export for desktop
Windows, Linux or macOS
window-exchexport-about: Exported movies are saved as ZIP files that you can download and import on other TilBuci installations or use on your own project. Notice that this process may take some time. If you are sure you want to export the current movie, click the button below. After creating the ZIP file, the download will automatically start.
window-exchexport-ok: Your movie was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from  the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.
window-exchimport-aboutid: To begin the movie import process, please provide a movie ID (you may use the same one of the exported movie, but that is not required).
window-exchimport-aboutupload: Now, select the movie ZIP file to upload. You may also copy your movie ZIP file to the export folder of your TilBuci installation server with the name [NAME].zip. The import process may take some time.
window-exchimport-buttonselectzip: Select a ZIP file to upload
window-exchimport-buttonalready: The [NAME].zip file is already saved at the export folder
window-exchimport-error: Error while setting the imported movie ID.
window-exchimport-errorid: The movie ID you provided is already in use.
window-exchimport-errorsend: Error while uploading the movie file. Please try again.
window-exchimport-errorimport: Error while importing the movie file. Please try again.
window-exchimport-errorimp1: Your user is not allowed to import movies.
window-exchimport-errorimp2: Error on uploaded movie ZIP file.
window-exchimport-errorimp3: The movie ID requestes is already in use.
window-exchimport-errorimp4: Error while creatig the movie folder. Please try again.
window-exchimport-errorimp5: The movie ZIP file is corrupted. Please try again.
window-exchimport-errorimp6: The ZIP file is not a valid movie. Please try again.
window-exchimport-impok: The movie ZIP file was imported!
window-exchsite-about: When you export the current movie as a website, TilBuci will either save it at the /sites folder of your installation or create a ZIP file with the website contents. Just access the exported URL or unzip all files into a folder of your site and you're ready to go! Notice that features that require server interaction, like visitor login, won't be available from the exported ZIP content unless the site URL is add to the CORS list of this installation visitors setup. When creating your site, plase be patient since the process may take some time.
window-exchsite-sitemap: Create a sitemap? If you want to create a sitemap file for your website, indicate the address from where it will be accessed. The provided address will be automatically add to the enabled CORS list.
window-exchsite-ok: Your website was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.
window-exchsite-siteok: Your website was exported. You can access it at [URL].
window-exchiframe-title: Export movie for iframe embed on sites
window-exchiframe-about: You can export your movie to embed it on websites using iframes. TilBuci will either save your content at the /sites folder of your installation or create a ZIP file with all necessary files, including an iframe.html embed example one. Just link to the the exported URL or unzip all files into a folder of your site and you're ready to go! Notice that features that require server interaction won't be available from the exported ZIP content unless the site URL is add to the CORS list of this installation visitors setup. While exporting, plase be patient since the process may take some time for larger movies.
window-exchiframe-ok: The iframe content was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.
window-exchiframe-siteok: Your content was exported. You can embed it using [URL].
window-exchpwa-title: Export movie as a PWA application
window-exchpwa-about: To export your movie as a Progressive Web Application, inform all the fields of current window and click the export button. TilBuci will either save it at the /pwa folder of your installation or create a zip file that you must uncompress into your webserver. Remember that the site must run from HTTPS to enable the PWA features. You can set the favicon image at the movie properties window - you MUST use a 512x512 pixels PNG file. The PWA export process may take some time. After that the download will start automatically. If you are updating a previously exported PWA app, just override the previous content with the newly exported one.
window-exchpwa-language: Language (use ISO639/1 language + - + ISO3166/1 contry code like en-US or pt-BR)
window-exchpwa-icon: Favicon (be sure you are using a 512x512 pixels PNG file)
window-exchpwa-url: Full URL to access your PWA
window-exchpwa-noname: You must provide the PWA app full and short names.
window-exchpwa-nopng: You must provide a 512x512 pixels PNG file as the favicon.
window-exchpwa-nolang: You must provide a valid language code like en-US or pt-BR.
window-exchpwa-nourl: Pelase provide an access url starting with https://
window-exchpwa-error: Error while exporting your PWA application.
window-exchpwa-ok: Your PWA application was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from  the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.
window-exchpwa-location: Export to (your installation must run from HTTPS to enable the /pwa export option)
window-exchpwa-siteok: Your PWA was exported. You can access it at [URL].
window-exchpub-about: You can export your creation for publishing on services like itch.io or Game Jolt. Just click the button below to export a zip file. At the services, include your creation as an HTML project. You may need to allow the service domain to communicate with this TilBuci installation to use online features like login or save states (just go to Visitors left menu and look for the CORS tab - itch.io and gamejolt.com are automatically enabled).
window-exchpub-error: Error while exporting your movie. Please try again.
window-exchpub-ok: Your movie was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from  the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.
window-exchdesk-title: Save movie as a desktop app
window-exchdesk-about: You can export your movie as an ElectronJS project to create a desktop application for Windows, Linux or macOS systems, just fill the form values. You can use the system.quit action to close yout application - this is important if you are creating a fullscreen or kiosk application. After the project is creted, TilBuci will start downloading a zip file. Please check out the included readme.txt file for further instructions. Desktop applications require some movie information like the icon, the author and a description.
window-exchdesk-error: Error while exporting your application. Please try again.
window-exchdesk-ok: Your application was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from the export folder of your TilBuci installation server. Please check out the included readme.txt file for further instructions.
window-exchdesk-aboutnw: The desktop applications are created using Electron JS.
window-exchdesk-icon: App icon file (set at the movie properties)
window-exchdesk-author: App author (set at the movie properties)
window-exchdesk-description: App description (set at the movie properties)
window-exchdesk-errormiss: You must provide the author name, the description and the favicon at the movie properties window.
window-exchcord-about: TilBuci uses the Apache Cordova project to enable the creation of mobile apps for Android and iOS/iPadOS. If this is the first time you are creating an app for the current movie, please export the complete project. If you already have an app, select the update project below. The exported ZIP file contains further instructions about setting up the Apache Cordova and creating/distributing your application. This window form values are used only on complete project export.
window-exchcord-icon: App icon (use a 512x512 pixels PNG file)
window-exchcord-aboutcord: The mobile apps are created using Apache Cordova.
window-exchcord-error: Error while exporting your project. Please try again.
window-exchcord-ok: Your project was exported. Please wait for the download to begin. You can also download the zip file from the export folder of your TilBuci installation server.

window-media-addstageer: Error while adding the media to the stage.
window-media-uploader: Error while uploading the file. Please try again.

window-collection-astframeser: The number of spritemap frames must be at least 1.
window-collection-astfrtimeser: The spritemap frame time must be at least 50 miliseconds.
window-collection-astfileser: All asset files (@1 to @5) must be set.
window-collection-colnameer: The collection name must contain at least 5 chars.
window-collection-colapplyok: The current collections will be updated. Are you sure?

window-mdtext-about: Text (use paragraph  or html media type for large text)
window-mdvideo-loaderror: Error while loading the video file.
window-mdaudio-loaderror: Error while loading the audio file.
window-mdhtml-loaderror: Error while loading the HTML file.
window-mdembed-addabout: You can add HTML5 content to display on a layer above your TilBuci movie. You must provide a ZIP file with the root of your HTML5 project. This project must contain an index.html file to be loaded. No server scripts, like PHP files, are supported. If you want to update a previously uploaded content, remove it first and send the new file with the same name.
window-mdembed-addname: Embed name (single word, no spaces or special chars)
window-mdembed-smallname: Please use a name of at least 5 chars.
window-mdembed-uperror: Error while sending the embed ZIP file. Please try again.
window-mdembed-procerror: Error while processing the ZIP file. Does it contain an index.html file?
window-mdembed-removeconfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the selected embed content?
window-setup-created: TilBuci is an interactive animation free software developed by [NAME]. Please check out tilbuci.com.br for further information.
window-setup-tilbuci: Buci is a messy and often quite insane dog that we all love. This software is dedicated to all the joy it brings to our daily lives.

window-setup-user-passerror: Error while setting the new password. Please try again.

window-setup-config-rdabout: The default renderer uses WebGL on a canvas element for the best performance. Use the [experimental] hotsite one for a traditional DOM-based display with selectable texts.

window-setup-email-saveabout: If you save the current values, an e-mail message will be sent to the informed address with a validation code. Please come back to this screen to provide this code when you receive it. If you proceed, the current e-mail sending settings will be removed.
window-setup-email-saveerror: We found errors while sending the test e-mail message. Please verify the settings and try again.
window-setup-email-saveok: A message with a validation code was sent to the provided e-mail address. Please check your inbox and come back to this screen to finish the setup process.
window-setup-email-codeabout: Please look for a validation code message on your inbox and enter it below. If you didn't receive it, just scroll down and click the 'Save configuration' button again.
window-setup-email-codeno6: The confirmation code must contain 6 characters.
window-setup-email-codecorrupt: The information about the e-mail settings were corrputed. Plase save a new configuiration to tray again.
window-setup-email-codewrong: The provided validation code was wrong. Please try again.
window-setup-email-codevalid: The following configuration is valid for e-mail sending.

window-visitors-list-unblvisitorconf: Are you sure you want to allow the selected visitor?
window-visitors-list-rmvisitorconf: Are you sure you want to remove this visitor record and all its saved data?

window-visitors-addvsgrer: Error while adding a visitor. Please try again.
window-visitors-rmvsgrer: Error while removing a visitor. Please try again.
window-visitors-event-about: Use the form below to filter events and export them as a CSV spreadsheet.
window-visitors-event-clear: Clear events: use the form below to clear events from the database. Attention: this operation can't be undone.
window-visitors-event-clearconfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the event records?
window-visitors-event-clearname: Event name to remove (leave blank for all)
window-visitors-event-erexport: Error while exporting the event records. Please try again.
window-visitors-event-erremove: Error while removing the event records. Please try again.
window-visitors-cors-about: When you export your movies, they can still access this server functionality, but you must first allow the communications from the TilBuci player hosted on the publishing sites. The list below shows the domains already allowed to communicate with your server. Every time you export a creation like a website or a PWA application, the provided address is automatically add to this list, but you may also manually add or remove items from it. Content running from a desktop app is always allowed to communicate.
window-visitors-cors-errorrm: Error while removing the domain. Please try again.
window-visitors-cors-erroradd: Error while adding the domain. Please try again.
window-notes-nonotes: Error while retrieving the design notes.
window-notes-nosave: Error while saving the design note.
acblock-paramvariable: must be a variable name starting with $, # or ?.
acinfo-showmenu-p5: x distance from border or position
acinfo-showmenu-p6: y distance from border or position
acinfo-setformvalue: set an element value of current input form
acinfo-setformvalue-p2: the value to set (true/false for toggles)
acinfo-ifboolset: check if a boolean variable is set
acinfo-ifintsdifferent: check if two int values are different
acinfo-ifintsequal: check if two int values are equal
acinfo-ifintset: check if an int variable is set
acinfo-ifintgreater: check if the first int value is greater
acinfo-ifintlower: check if the first int value is lower
acinfo-ifintgreaterequal: check if the first int value is greater or equal
acinfo-ifintlowerequal: check if the first int value is lower or equal
acinfo-intabs: get the absolute value of an int
acinfo-intabs-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intdivide-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intmax-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intmin-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intmultiply-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intrandom-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intsubtract-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-intsum-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-inttofloat: convert an int value to float
acinfo-inttofloat-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-inttostring: convert an int value to a string
acinfo-inttostring-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-iffloatsdifferent: check if two float values are different
acinfo-iffloatsequal: check if two float values are equal
acinfo-iffloatset: check if a float variable is set
acinfo-iffloatgreater: check if the first float value is greater
acinfo-iffloatlower: check if the first float value is lower
acinfo-iffloatgreaterequal: check if the first float value is greater or equal
acinfo-iffloatlowerequal: check if the first float value is lower or equal
acinfo-floatabs: get the absolute value of a float
acinfo-floatabs-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatdivide-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatmax-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatmin-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatmultiply-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatrandom-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatsubtract-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floatsum-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floattoint: convert a float value to integer
acinfo-floattoint-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-floattostring: convert a float value to a string
acinfo-floattostring-p1: variable name to receive the result
acinfo-dataload: load custom data saved on the server
acinfo-dataloadlocal: load custom data saved on local storage
acinfo-dataloadquickstate: load a quick saved state from server
acinfo-dataloadstatelocal: load the save state from the local storage
acinfo-datasave-p2: first variable name to save (you can add more)
acinfo-datasavelocal: save custom data on local storage
acinfo-datasavelocal-p2: first variable name to save (you can add more)
acinfo-datasavequickstate: save a quick state on the server
acinfo-datasavestate: save a state on the server
acinfo-datasavestatelocal: save a state on local storage
acinfo-inputemail: show the e-mail address input interface
acinfo-inputemail-p1: string variable to receive the address
acinfo-inputemail-p2: text to display on input window
acinfo-inputfloat: show the float value input interface
acinfo-inputfloat-p1: float variable to receive the value
acinfo-inputfloat-p2: text to display on input window
acinfo-inputint: show the integer value input interface
acinfo-inputint-p1: int variable to receive the value
acinfo-inputint-p2: text to display on input window
acinfo-inputlist-p1: string variable to receive the value
acinfo-inputlist-p2: text to display on input window
acinfo-inputlist-p4: second list option (you may add more)
acinfo-inputmessage: show a message to the visitor
acinfo-inputstring-p1: string variable to receive the value
acinfo-inputstring-p2: text to display on input window
acinfo-inputadd: add a text input to the screen
acinfo-inputplace: set a text input size and position
acinfo-inputsettext: set the content of a text input
acinfo-inputsetpassword: set a text input password mask display
acinfo-inputaddnumeric: add a numeric input to the screen
acinfo-inputplacenumeric: set a numeric input size and position
acinfo-inputaddaddtoggle: add a toggle input to the screen
acinfo-inputplacetoggle: place a toggle input on screen
acinfo-instanceseek: jump instance playback to a time position
acinfo-instancesetfontbackground-p2: the color in hex format (0x######) or empty for no color
acinfo-instanceloadasset: load a collection asset into the instance
acinfo-instanceclearcoloralpha: clear set instance overlay color opacity
acinfo-instanceclearfontbackground: clear set instance text background color
acinfo-instanceclearfontcolor: clear set instance text font color
acinfo-instanceclearfontleading: clear set instance text leading space
acinfo-instanceclearfontsize: clear set instance text lfont size
acinfo-replaceorigin: change the current movie images origin
acinfo-replacesetfile: set a replacement for file name/path
acinfo-ifreplacestringset: check if a string replacement is set
acinfo-ifreplacestringset-p1: the needle (text part to replace) to check
acinfo-ifreplacefileset: check if a file name/path replacement is set
acinfo-ifreplacefileset-p1: the needle (name/path part to replace) to check
acinfo-systemcopytext: copy a text to the clipboard
acinfo-systemvisitoringroup: check if current visitor is in a group
acinfo-systemvisitoringroup-p1: the group name to check (case sensitive)
acinfo-systemquit: end app execution (while on desktop app mode)
acinfo-systemifpwainstalled: check if running from an installed PWA
acinfo-systemifhorizontal: check if the display is horizontal
acinfo-systemifvertical: check if the display is vertical
acinfo-systemifwebsite: check if running on website export runtime
acinfo-systemifpwa: check if running on PWA export runtime
acinfo-systemifdesktop: check if running on desktop app export runtime
acinfo-systemifmobile: check if running on mobile app export runtime
acinfo-systemifpublish: check if running on publish services export runtime
acinfo-systemifplayer: check if running on TilBuci player
acinfo-systemsendevent: send a custom event to player listeners
acinfo-systemsembedplace: set the size/position of embed html5 content
acinfo-systemembedreset: reset the HTML5 embed content size/position
acinfo-stringconcat-p1: the string variable to receive the result
acinfo-stringconcat-p3: the second string to concatenate (may add more)
acinfo-stringreplace: replace a substring in a string
acinfo-stringreplace-p1: the string variable to receive the result
acinfo-stringsetgroup: set a strings group for strings.json
acinfo-stringtofloat: convert a string to a float value
acinfo-stringtofloat-p1: the float variable name to receive the result
acinfo-stringtoint: convert a string to an integer value
acinfo-stringtoint-p1: the int variable name to receive the result
acinfo-ifstringcontains: check if a string contains another one
acinfo-ifstringendswith: check if a string ends with another one
acinfo-ifstringsdifferent: check if two strings are different
acinfo-ifstringsequal: check if two strings are equal
acinfo-ifstringset: check if a string variable is set
acinfo-ifstringstartswith: check if a string starts with another one
acinfo-ifstringemail: check if a string is a valie e-mail address
acinfo-debugtrace: show a text on browser console
acinfo-debugtrace-p1: the text do show (you may add more)
acinfo-debugtracebools: show boolean variables on browser console
acinfo-debugtraceints: show integer variables on browser console
acinfo-debugtracefloats: show float variables on browser console
acinfo-debugtracestrings: show string variables on browser console
acinfo-callprocess-p2: string data to send (you may add more)
acinfo-callsdprocess: send data for processing on player same domain
acinfo-callsdprocess-p2: string data to send (you may add more)
acinfo-callurl: send a GET request to an URL
acinfo-callurl-p2: string variable to receive the result (optional)
acinfo-overlayshow-p3: add additional information to overlay URL?
acinfo-overlayshow-p4: additional informaiton to send (may add more)
tooltip-action-copy: copy the current code to clipboard
tooltip-action-plus: additional actions like system and timers
tooltip-movie-remove: only available when no movie is loaded
tooltip-movie-nolevel: your access level doesn't allow movie handling
tooltip-movie-noowner: you are not the owner of the current movie
tooltip-movie-nomovieaccess: no movie loaded or no access level
tooltip-movie-nomovieowner: no movie open or you are not the owner of the current one
